channel.title: If you have a private server running will you get problems with jagex?
channel.description:
If you have private server running with a cummity like example
dodian/frugooscape quit big cummity if they get caught by jagex? will it be shutted down and do you have to pay a high amount of bill to jagex for copyrighted material?
iam wondering this because kasparscape got closed and he said he got a message send with a police officer and he had to close down server and promise never to do again or he had high bills i dont know if this story is treu but why should owner make a joke like that? when he has over 100hundreds of players?

item.title: If you have a private server running will you get problems with jagex?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

who gives a hell… private servers are way better… runescape just sucks… jagex has the only power to suck… the creator dosnt even mess around wit it any more… he has his ppl do it for him… so andrew dosnt get blamed lol but ppl still say he is doing it… but oh well cuz runescape is in hell and will probally go out of business which will leave dodian the leading money maker for RPG games in the general 3D area…

Read full topic

lol maybe if they see that you own a private server they might give you a warning or ipban you from runescape rofl…
[/quote]

runescape is gay so i wouldnt give a shit…
the graphic update killed runescape…[/quote]

thats why i added “rofl”

item.title: If you have a private server running will you get problems with jagex?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

lol blow jagex! they cant touch them… they might have legal binded actions but truly they cant do anything because they are not the owners of the systems… Mopar created servers to have fun and which dodian does charge money… but it dosnt matter because jagex wont do anything… for the simple fact that they have no power in suing…lol they have tryed suing some guy for “copying” runescape… but how? because runescape is there for everyone and if they want to keep ppl from getting games like then maybe they should protect it better their 4000 fire walls and like 1000 ppl that work for them cant do a good enough job… so y not hide their ip adress? maybe because they are behind in the technology thats why there is a moparscape thats y dodian has more players on it daily and for a longer period of time the runescape, well i think i proved my point lol… so ya they cant in trouble unless they hack runescape… which is sorta easy considering they have 10 fire walls blocking the comp and the rest are protecting the game but oh well i dont think any1 will try and hack the gayest game in the world.

Read full topic

anykind of trouble for hosting a private server.
